PRESIDENT
SEYMOUR N. SIEGEL
WNYC, Municipal Broadcasting System
2500 Municipal Building
New York 7, N. Y.
March 25fch, 1952
Mr* Burton Paulu
KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis, Minnesota
Dear Barton*
I have a copy of your letter of March 14th addressed
to Bob Colemano I certainly don’t see any objection to furnishing
the members of the Research Committee, or any other Committee
member, with Board minutes• I am, however, somewhat concerned
by the sudden Interest on the part of George Probot in seeing that
copies of these minutes are distributed to a Committee in which
he has no interest*
I would suggest that all future requests of this nature
be considered by the Executive Boamittee,
Beat wishes.
Seymour N. Siegel
President
sns/t
CC* Ausmus
Representing non-commercial, educational, radio and television stations, workshops, and production
centers, owned and operated by colleges, universities, school systems and public-service agencies.
